com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.version

Class PublishManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.version.PublishManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPublishManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoopPublishManager, SnomedPublishManager

    public abstract class PublishManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPublishManager
    Abstract component publish manager implementation.

        public final void publish(PublishOperationConfiguration configuration,

                   throws SnowowlServiceException
        Description copied from interface: IPublishManager
        Performs the publication based on the configuration argument.
        Specified by:
        publish in interface IPublishManager
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration for the operation.
        monitor - monitor for the publication process.
        Throws:
        SnowowlServiceException - if the publication failed.

      • adjustComponentForPublication

        protected void adjustComponentForPublication(CDOEditingContext context,
                                             org.eclipse.emf.cdo.common.revision.CDORevision revision,
                                             java.lang.Object effectiveTime)
        Adjusts the properties of the given revision for the publication.

        By default this method:

        • Sets the effective time on the component.
        • Sets the released flag on the component (if supported).

      • isIgnoredType

        protected boolean isIgnoredType(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass)
        Returns true if a component given with its EClass has to be ignored from the publication process. Otherwise returns with false.

        By default this method always returns with false.

      • preProcess

        protected void preProcess(LongSet storageKeys,
                          PublishOperationConfiguration config)
        Performs any arbitrary pre-processing operation before the publication.

        Does nothing by default. Clients may extend this method.

      • postProcess

        protected void postProcess(CDOEditingContext editingContext,
                           PublishOperationConfiguration config)
        Performs any arbitrary post-processing operation after adjusting the desired properties of all unversioned components and before committing the changes.

        Does nothing by default. Clients may extend this method.

      • adjustComponents

        protected void adjustComponents(CDOEditingContext editingContext,
                                LongSet storageKeys,
                                java.lang.Object effectiveTime)
        Adjusts all un.versioned components given as a set of component storage keys.

      • getBranchPathForPublication

        protected final java.lang.String getBranchPathForPublication(PublishOperationConfiguration config)
        Returns with the branch path for the given transaction to perform the publication. This is version dependent.
        Parameters:
        config -

      • getReleasedValue

        protected java.lang.Object getReleasedValue()
        Returns with a value representing that an object is released. This value will be dynamically set on the object's feature.
